name: One Moment, Please.
description:
In One Moment, Please you are the only human call center rep left in the office. Everyone has been replaced by robots. You have only one minute to plan out how you will beat the robo-callers in the office, taking the call and providing human interaction. In this top-down turn-based puzzle game, you must strategically move around the map and shoot to kill- or at least horrifically disable your automated coworkers. You cannot move on without eliminating all of them. Good luck and godspeed to you.

Directions: 

WASD to move. Space to shoot. Hover over robots to see their movement pattern.

If you run out of moves or get shot, the robots will be able to take over the call centre.

Resources Used:

Piano Cover of Raffi's Bananaphone (raffinews.com) (https://raffifoundation.org/)
